text: Yorton is a small village in Shropshire, England. It is in the civil parish of Clive. It is 7.01 miles (11.28 km) north of Shrewsbury and 3.31 miles (5.33 km) south of Wem. The village is known for its railway station. It is on the Welsh Marches line between Newport and Crewe. ==Gallery== File:Yorton_station_-_2011-06-11.jpg|Yorton railway station Category:Villages in Shropshire
title: Yorton
